If I <seg xml:id="C32_app408-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0172__main__20"/>w <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0172__main__d4e34247">h</del> ere <seg xml:id="C32_app408-fMS_end"/> engaged in any high undertaking <lb n="c57-0172__main__21"/>or <seg xml:id="C32_app410-fMS_start"/> design <seg xml:id="C32_app410-fMS_end"/> fraught with extensive <w ana="start"/>uti<lb n="c57-0172__main__22"/>lity<w ana="end"/> to my <seg xml:id="C32_app412-fMS_start"/> fellow creatures <seg xml:id="C32_app412-fMS_end"/> then could I <lb n="c57-0172__main__23"/>live to fulfil <seg xml:id="C32_app414-fMS_start"/> it—But <seg xml:id="C32_app414-fMS_end"/> such is not my <seg xml:id="C32_app416-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0172__main__24"/>destiny –I <seg xml:id="C32_app416-fMS_end"/> must pursue & destroy the <seg xml:id="C32_app418-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0172__main__25"/><mod sID="c57-0172__main__d4e34266"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0172__main__d4e34268">creature</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0172.01"/><lb n="c57-0172__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0172__left_margin__d4e34277"/>being <seg xml:id="C32_app418-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0172__left_margin__d4e34277"/><mod eID="c57-0172__main__d4e34266"/>to whom I gave <seg xml:id="C32_app420-fMS_start"/> existence <seg xml:id="C32_app420-fMS_end"/> then <lb n="c57-0172__main__26"/>my <seg xml:id="C32_app422-fMS_start"/> task <seg xml:id="C32_app422-fMS_end"/> will be <seg xml:id="C32_app424-fMS_start"/> fulfilled <seg xml:id="C32_app424-fMS_end"/> & I may <seg xml:id="C32_app426-fMS_start"/> die. <seg xml:id="C32_app426-fMS_end"/>
